Parameter.Label: Current Overload Protection
Parameter.Help: Load will be closed when current more that 39.5A and time more 5 seconds

Parameter.Label: Automated sending of a Report triggered by minimal change of value.
Automated sending of a Report triggered by minimal change of value.

Parameter to Enable/Disable automated sending of a Report triggered by minimal change of value.

Parameter.Label: Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Parameter.Help: The value represents the minimum change in Wattage for a Report to be sent.
The value represents the minimum change in Wattage for a Report to be sent.

Parameter.Label: Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Parameter.Help: The value represents the minimum change in Watage Percent for a report to be sent.
The value represents the minimum change in Watage Percent for a report to be sent.

Parameter.Label: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1
Welche Berichte sollen automatisch zu den definierten intervallen der Gruppe 1 gesendet werden
Parameter.Help: The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters. The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1. Therefore if you want all parameters sending regular reports, set the parameter to 15 (8 + 4 + 2 + 1).
